oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Meharry Graduate in cap and gown
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lay Brothers Studio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Achieving Recognition
Medical profession
African Americans; Medical Students; Meharry Medical College
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A young African American man, with a mustache, wire-rimmed glasses, a slight smile, and close cropped hair, dressed in an academic robe, white stand up collar, and mortar board with tassel on his right. The mat has a small, red and black banner, with Meharry, at lower left.
